title: Roof Bolters, Mining
descr: Operate machinery to install roof support bolts in underground mine.
alt_titles: Bolt Machine Operator, Bolt Man, Bolter, Bolting Inspector, Bolting Machine Operator, Miner, Place Change Roof Bolter, Roof Bolter, Roof Bolter Operator, Roof Bolting Coal Miner, Truss Assembler, Underground Bolting Machine Operator, Underground Miner, Underground Roof Bolter
experience: Some previous work-related skill, knowledge, or experience is usually needed. For example, a teller would benefit from experience working directly with the public.
education: These occupations usually require a high school diploma.
job_training: Employees in these occupations need anywhere from a few months to one year of working with experienced employees. A recognized apprenticeship program may be associated with these occupations.
example: These occupations often involve using your knowledge and skills to help others. Examples include orderlies, counter and rental clerks, customer service representatives, security guards, upholsterers, tellers, and dental laboratory technicians.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Force bolts into holes, using hydraulic mechanisms of self-propelled bolting machines.
work_tasks.descr: Force bolts into holes, using hydraulic mechanisms of self-propelled bolting machines.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Perform ventilation tasks, such as hanging ventilation curtains and tubes.
work_tasks.descr: Perform ventilation tasks, such as hanging ventilation curtains and tubes.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Install various types of bolts, including truss, glue, and resin bolts, traversing entire ceiling spans.
work_tasks.descr: Install various types of bolts, including truss, glue, and resin bolts, traversing entire ceiling spans.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Pull down loose rock that cannot be supported.
work_tasks.descr: Pull down loose rock that cannot be supported.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Position bolting machines, and insert drill bits into chucks.
work_tasks.descr: Position bolting machines, and insert drill bits into chucks.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Perform safety checks on equipment before operating.
work_tasks.descr: Perform safety checks on equipment before operating.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Perform tests to determine if methane gas is present.
work_tasks.descr: Perform tests to determine if methane gas is present.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Drill test holes and test bolts for specified tension, using torque wrenches.
work_tasks.descr: Drill test holes and test bolts for specified tension, using torque wrenches.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Position safety jacks to support underground mine roofs until bolts can be installed.
work_tasks.descr: Position safety jacks to support underground mine roofs until bolts can be installed.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Rotate chucks to turn bolts and open expansion heads against rock formations.
work_tasks.descr: Rotate chucks to turn bolts and open expansion heads against rock formations.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Remove drill bits from chucks after drilling holes, and insert bolts into chucks.
work_tasks.descr: Remove drill bits from chucks after drilling holes, and insert bolts into chucks.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Tighten ends of anchored truss bolts, using turnbuckles.
work_tasks.descr: Tighten ends of anchored truss bolts, using turnbuckles.

work_tasks.title: Roof Bolters, Mining
work_tasks.task: Drill bolt holes into roofs at specified distances from ribs or adjacent bolts.
work_tasks.descr: Drill bolt holes into roofs at specified distances from ribs or adjacent bolts.
